definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
according to a report/It is reported that...

sentences.english: Look for more to come and enjoy today's feature.
sentences.chinese: 敬请期待后续报道，享受今天的内容。

sentences.english: This past offseason there were tons of reports circulating around Kobe Bryant's wish to be traded.
sentences.chinese: 过去的那个休赛期，有很多关于科比想被交易的报道。
你们大部分人采访报道过我。

sentences.english: This paper described a novel thermopile detector for infrared horizon sensors.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了试用于红外地平仪的新型热堆传感器。

sentences.english: Full-page newspaper ads hawk the fast-selling J3 hatchback.
sentences.chinese: 整版报纸广告都在报道J3的销售。

sentences.english: The final score will depend on whether those stories are published.
sentences.chinese: 最后的比分，要看那些报道是否能够刊发。

sentences.english: Fry shelled fresh shrimps additionally to also have similar effect with spadger egg according to the report.
sentences.chinese: 另据报道用麻雀蛋炒虾仁也有类似功效。

sentences.english: We used a funnel plot to evaluate reports for publication bias.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用倒漏斗图形对出版偏倚的报道进行评价。

sentences.english: And why is there so little actual reporting on the process of science?
sentences.chinese: 为什么目前关于科学发展真实的报道少之又少呢？

sentences.english: The adaptability of ground-cover Chrysanthemum group in Hainan is studied.
sentences.chinese: 文章报道了地被菊在海南引种的适应性情况。

sentences.english: In May, we reported about a new album from singer Josh Groban.
sentences.chinese: 五月份，我们报道过一张乔许葛洛班的新专辑。

sentences.english: We are glad to see, newspaper can give community citizen reportorial chance.
sentences.chinese: 我们高兴看到，报纸能给予社区市民报道机会。

sentences.english: The domestic report botulism causes to breathe the myoparalysis case of illness to be less.
sentences.chinese: 国内报道肉毒中毒导致呼吸肌麻痹的病例较少。

sentences.english: Flooding forced the closure of manufacturing plants in Ayutthaya, according to news reports.
sentences.chinese: 据新闻报道，洪水已迫使大城府的制造工厂关闭。

sentences.english: The official death toll has also risen, to 110, 000 people.
sentences.chinese: 官方报道的死亡人口数字也已经上升到11万。

sentences.english: Names in this story have been changed to protect the interviewees.
sentences.chinese: 这篇报道中的人名都被改了，以保护被采访人。

definition: according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
to quote/to cite/to recommend (one's friend's, associates etc)
according to a report/It is reported that...
medium/intermediary/matchmaker/go-between/abbr. for 媒體|媒体[mei2 ti3], media, esp. news media
foreign news media/abbr. of 外國媒體|外国媒体
